verdict.feature_description: Automatically translates user messages in real-time and stores translated history for future retrieval.
verdict.reasoning: The consolidated reasoning is based on the individual jury reports. GDPR (Article 5, Section 1) and CCPA require businesses to adhere to regional data protection standards in EU and California respectively. Additionally, IT Act 2000 mandates data localization requirements for processing sensitive personal data in India. For the Auto Chat Translation feature, storing translated user messages requires consideration of these regulations, necessitating geo-specific compliance logic.
